rooms.description: Wide entrance leading to living area; incorporates Vastu principles with main door facing east.
Open-plan space adjoining dining area. Natural light optimized by large windows and north-facing orientation in accordance to Vastu for prosperity.
Separate yet connected with living room; includes south facing window ensuring balanced energy flow.
Adjacent to balcony; features modern decor and east-facing windows for positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Corner room with a spacious balcony facing northeast. Provides privacy and natural light while following Vastu principles.

openings.description: Grand entrance designed to harness positive energy as per Vastu norms.
Large window ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Door leading to the balcony for fresh air and scenic views.
Spacious door connecting the master bedroom to its private balcony.

rooms.description: Open-air leisure space with panoramic views. Designed for relaxation and social gatherings while adhering to Vastu by ensuring open spaces.
Dedicated fitness area on the rooftop, offering privacy and excellent ventilation. Equipment layout follows functional flow aligned with local building norms.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and Rooftop Terrace
openings.description: Steep, secure staircase ensuring compliance with building norms and accessibility.

rooms.description: Overall plan for the modern penthouse cottage, designed on a corner plot with strategic orientation. Balconies in each bedroom follow Vastu guidelines to harness natural energy.
